channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: The Wishing Tree. Nugget tries to make her friends' 'wishing tree' dreams come true but gets in a muddle.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Molly and Mack
channel.desc: Mum's Guitar. Mack is reminded of his mum's guitar, whilst Moira finds some roller boots in the Hub.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Waffle and the Kitten. Preschool comedy drama series. The Brooklyn-Bells lose the kitten they're looking after. Waffle knows it's at Mrs Hobbs's house, but Mrs Hobbs won't own up.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: Rainbow. Chasing rainbows with Oona, Baba, Mossy and May.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
channel.desc: It's Time to Swim Underwater. JoJo and her cousin Lexi are learning how to swim underwater - but it's a little bit tricky. It's time for a Gran Gran plan.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Moon and Me
channel.desc: Lily Plant's Lovely Day. In the Toy House, each of the friends decides to give Lily Plant some 'pretend water'.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Dragon Day. Stop-motion animation. Small decides that there should be a Dragon Day to thank the Soup Dragon for being so kind as to provide them with soup every day.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: What a Funny Ninky Nonk. Series set in a magical forest. The Tombliboos ride the Ninky Nonk. It goes past Igglepiggle, Upsy Daisy and Makka Pakka, and everybody tries to catch it.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Sue Perkins - The Pirate Mums. Sue Perkins tells the swashbuckling tale of the Pirate Mums who save the day on the high seas.
